key_facts: Project focuses on Smith-Waterman alignment implementation.
improved_sw.py executed successfully with alignment score 23 using 'py' launcher on Windows.
Initial run output: Homologous region 1: Score 23, Seq1 [1:17]: TGCATGCXXATGCATG, Seq2 [0:13]: TGCATGC---TGCATG
On Windows systems, use the 'py' launcher to execute Python files instead of the 'python' command, as the latter may not be recognized if Python was installed via the Microsoft Store.

conversation_history.outcome: Script ran successfully after using 'py' instead of 'python'.
Decided to implement as JSON file for persistence.
Added reminder to use 'py' launcher for future script executions.
